description: Updates a Network File System (NFS) file share. This operation is only supported in the file gateway type.  To leave a file share field unchanged, set the corresponding input field to null.  Updates the following file share setting:   Default storage class for your S3 bucket   Metadata defaults for your S3 bucket   Allowed NFS clients for your file share   Squash settings   Write status of your file share    To leave a file share field unchanged, set the corresponding input field to null. This operation is only supported in file gateways.
